Summarize the events of this story.
Once upon a time, there lived a poor woodcutter named John. He had three children and a wife who struggled with poverty everyday. One day, the woodcutter found a mysterious tree in the forest. From it, he was able to harvest golden apples. He took it home and shared the golden apples with his family, who were able to use the wealth to improve their circumstances.

In this story, a poor woodcutter named John, who lives with his wife and three children, struggles with poverty daily. One day, while in the forest, John discovers a mysterious tree that bears golden apples. He harvests these golden apples and shares them with his family. The newfound wealth from the golden apples helps improve their living conditions and alleviates their poverty.
